author: wtopstaff
title: Fight Schedule
text:
By The Associated Press October 11, 2015 11:24 pm Oct. 13 
At Little Creek Casino Resort, Shelton, Wash. (FS1), Gerald Washington vs. Amir Mansour, 10, heavyweights. Oct. 14 
At Gila River Arena, Glendale, Ariz. (ESPN), Devon Alexander vs. Aron Martinez, 10, welterweights; Lee Selby vs. Fernando Montiel, 12, for Selby’s IBF featherweight title. Oct. 16 
At Aviator Sports Complex, Brooklyn, N.Y. (truV): Sean Monaghan vs. Donovan George, 10, light heavyweights; Brad Solomon vs. Steve Clagett, 10, welterweights. 
At UIC Pavilion, Chicago (spikeTV), Kohei Kono vs. Koki Kameda, 12, for Kono’s WBA World super flyweight title; Andrzej Fonfara vs. Nathan Cleverly, 12, light heavyweights. Oct. 17 
At Madison Square Garden, New York (PPV), Gennady Golovkin vs. David Lemieux, 12, for Golovkin’s WBA Super World-interim WBC-IBO middleweight titles and Lemieux’s IBF middleweight title; Roman Gonzalez vs. Brian Viloria, 12, for Gonzalez’s WBC flyweight title; Luis Ortiz vs. Matias Ariel Vidondo, 12, for the interim WBA World heavyweight title; Tureano Johnson vs. Eamonn O’Kane, 12, middleweights. 
At EagleBank Arena, Fairfax, Va. (NBC), Lamont Peterson vs. Felix Diaz, 12, welterweights; Andre Dirrell vs. Blake Caparello, 10, super middleweights. Oct. 23 
At the Celebrity Theatre, Phoenix (SHO), Rob Brant vs. Louis Rose, 10, middleweights. 
At Fantasy Springs Resort Casino, Indio, Calif., Joseph Diaz Jr. vs. Ruben Tamayo, 10, featherweights; Frankie Gomez vs. Jorge Silva, 10, welterweights. Oct. 24 
At CenturyLink Center, Omaha, Neb. (HBO), Terence Crawford vs. Dierry Jean, for Crawford’s WBO junior welterweight title; Mikael Zewski vs. Raymond Serrano, 10, welterweights. 
At Sheffield, England (SHO), Kell Brook vs. Diego Chaves, 12, for Brook’s IBF welterweight title; Gavin McDonnell vs. Jeremy Parodi, 12, for McDonnell’s European junior featherweight title; Leigh Wood vs. Josh Wale, 10, featherweights; Dave Allen vs. Adam Machaj, 10, heavyweights. Nov. 4 
At Kazan, Russia, Denis Lebedev vs. Lateef Kayode, 12, for Lebedev’s WBA World cruiserweight title; Alexander Povetkin vs. Mariusz Wach, 12, heavyweights; Rakhim Chakhkiev vs. Ola Afolabi, 12, cruiserweights; Cesar Cuenca vs. Eduard Troyanovsky, 12, for Cuenca’s IBF junior welterweight title. Nov. 6 
At The D Hotel & Casino, Las Vegas (SHO), Antoine Douglas vs. Les Sherrington, 10, middleweights. Nov. 7 
At Monte Carlo, Juergen Braehmer vs. Thomas Oosthuizen, 12, for Braehmer’s WBA World light heavyweight title; Yonfrez Parejo vs. Zhanat Zhakiyanov, 12, for Parejo’s interim WBA World bantamweight title; David Avanesyan vs. Charlie Navarro, 12, welterweights; Adam Etches vs. Yosuke Kirima, 12, for the interim PABA middleweight title; Amor Beladhj Ali vs. Jun Qiu Xiao, 12, junior featherweights. 
At the Thomas & Mack Center, Las Vegas (HBO), Timothy Bradley vs. Brandon Rios, 12, for Bradley’s WBO welterweight title; Vasyl Lomachenko vs. Romulo Koasicha, 12, for Lomachenko’s WBO featherweight title. Nov. 20 
At Cosmopolitan, Las Vegas (truTV), Gilberto Ramirez vs. Juan Camilo Novoa, 10, for the WBA Fedebol super middleweight title; Saul Rodriguez vs. Ivan Najera, 10, lightweights. Nov. 21 
At Manchester Arena, Lancashire, England, Darleys Perez vs. Anthony Crolla, 12, for Perez’s WBA World lightweight title. 
At Mandalay Bay Hotel & Casino, Las Vegas (PPV), Miguel Cotto vs. Canelo Alvarez, 12, for Cotto’s WBC middleweight title; Takashi Miura vs. Francisco Vargas, 12, for Miura’s WBC junior lightweight title; Randy Caballero vs. Lee Haskins, 12, for Caballero’s IBF bantamweight title. Nov. 24 
At Bangkok, Wanheng Menayothin vs. Young Gil Bae, 12, for Menayothin’s WBC minimumweight title. Nov. 28 
At the Videotron Centre, Quebec City, Quebec (SHO), James DeGale vs. Lucian Bute, 12, for DeGale’s IBF super middleweight title. Dec. 5 
At Barclays Center, Brooklyn, N.Y. (SHO), Daniel Jacobs vs. Peter Quillin, 12, for Jacobs’ WBA World middleweight title; Denis Shafikov vs. Rances Barthelemy, 12, for the vacant IBF lightweight title. Topics:
